title: Consent Check
body:
[NEED]
Collaborative Decision — decide together without top‑down control.

[CONTEXT]
Group level; 3–12 participants; used when a proposal is ready.

[PURPOSE]
Enable safe‑to‑try decisions quickly and visibly.

[LIVING PATTERNS]
- Early concerns improve outcomes.
- Small, reversible steps reduce risk.
- Time‑bound review keeps decisions alive.

[PROTOCOL STATEMENT]
Run a consent check: invite reasoned objections; improve or adopt. If no objections, adopt and set a review date; otherwise integrate concerns and iterate.

[ADAPTATION NOTES]
Preserve consent step and review requirement.

[CLOSING]
Record adoption publicly; set review_date.
needFull: Decide together without defaulting to hierarchy, force, or control.
